channel.title: Alex Ledger on Alex Ledger
channel.description: Recent content in Alex Ledger on Alex Ledger

item.title: Plants et al.
item.description:
Welcome!

This blog documents my journey through learning about plants, permaculture, gardening, herbalism and more.

My intention is to learn more about these topics, and I will share what I learn to help others who are interested. I hope that this website can be jumping-off point and reference for cool projects.
